entry.title: Bezold Experiments
entry.summary:
Overview: In this assigment we have to make 3 different Bezold patterns using the different color systems. At least fourcolors need to be used in the patterns. This will be done using colored pencils on a 5x7 paper
Progress:
Chosen pattern for project
Final Images

entry.title: Paint Pixels, and Pixie Sticks
entry.summary: Overview: In this assignmentwe had to choose a painting made before 1850 with a wide range of colors. Using photoshop to then split the image into a 8in square area, which will be used to do a color study on the image. Then recreating that area in pixels with the color-aid paper. Going back to the orignal image, taking the warm and cool colors we create a color wheel, and then finally recreatin...

entry.title: Albers Color Studies
entry.summary:
Overview: In this assigment the idea is to create different paper works based on Josef Albers Interaction of Colorwith to improve perception of color.
Progress: Choosing colors and cutting out parts of the color-aid paper.
Testing possible layouts before I glue the paper down
Final Image Image showing all four parts of the assigment
